pages.text: Those pesky Endermen! They always show up at night and steal blocks off the ground right from your nose. You have the feeling that the whole area here will be nothing but a single crater landscape in a month.

pages.title: Resonating Ender
pages.text: It looks like the Endermen come to this world to place something down. But what is this stuff? And $(italic)WHY$() do they leave it here?$(br2)Now that you hold one in your hands... they are pretty much everywhere! How didn't you notice earlier? Anyways, you are sure that you can definitely take advantage of this interesting material.
